settings.text: Read this before you scrub your toilet again.

As a senior woman, I know firsthand how frustrating facial hair can be. Thinning, sensitive skin makes traditional hair removal methods like waxing and tweezing a painful, time-consuming chore.

Not to mention how much shaving every day dries out mature, sensitive skin. 

So I was thrilled when my daughter gifted me the Pluxy Epil Pro Essentials set last Christmas. This game-changing kit has everything you need for gentle, effective, and long-lasting hair removal at home and 6 other bonus treatments that keep me looking barely 45!

Here are 10 reasons why it's the perfect gift for any woman over 60:

SwooshnShine by TrueClean uses real chemistry — not magnets, not bleach — to stop hard water stains before they form. Every flush prevents buildup... kills pink slime... and keeps your bowl clean without scrubbing. No gimicks.

settings.heading: 85% of American homes have hard water. Here's what it's doing to your toilet right now.
settings.text:
Every flush deposits invisible calcium and magnesium onto your porcelain.

You can't see it happening.

But it's happening.

Those minerals harden into rings, stains, and that stubborn yellowish crust you scrub off every week.

Hard water toilets collect buildup and pink slime bacteria up to 3x faster.

You scrub it off Sunday. Back by Wednesday.

Because you're cleaning the symptom, not the cause.

We created Swoosh n Shine to fix the cause. Here's why 200,000+ households made the switch.

settings.heading: Reason #1: I'll give you your weekends back
settings.text:
This handles your toilet so you never scrub on your knees again.

Without Swoosh n Shine: scrubbing once or twice a week.

On your knees.

Bleach fumes burning your eyes.

So you can do it all again next Sunday.

With this system: a quick monthly touch-up.

Maybe less.

European water utilities have used mineral chelation for decades.

In hard water regions like Denmark, it cut household cleaner use by 30-50%.

Now picture this: Saturday morning. You walk past the bathroom and keep walking.

Because your toilet handled itself while you slept.

You didn't buy your home to spend weekends scrubbing toilets.

settings.heading: Reason #2: Why magnets don't clean toilets
settings.text:
Some products claim a magnet keeps your toilet clean. Think about that for a second.

Magnets don't dissolve calcium.

Magnets don't kill bacteria.

Magnets don't break down biofilm.

Zero peer-reviewed science backs magnetic toilet cleaning. None.

Here's what this formula actually does.

Citric acid chelates minerals.

Keeps them dissolved.

So they flush away instead of bonding to porcelain.

Two plant-derived surfactants strip grime and biofilm every single flush.

The formula stays concentrated in your bowl water between flushes.

24/7.

Not magic. Chemistry.

Dispenser releases formula into tank -> treated water flows into bowl on every flush -> prevents deposits -> continuous cycle.

Real ingredients. Proven science. Not a magnet and a prayer.

settings.heading: Reason #3: A formula that won't poison your pets
settings.text:
67% of US homes have pets. Most toilet cleaners are toxic to them.

Your dog drinks from the toilet.

You know it. I know it.

Nothing stops them.

Most automatic cleaners use benzalkonium chloride.

Toxic to pets, especially cats.

I replaced it with sodium benzoate.

Every ingredient is pet-safe at bowl-water dilution.

No bleach. No synthetic dyes. No phosphates. No toxic fumes.

Your dog's going to drink from the bowl anyway. Now you don't have to panic about it.

settings.heading: Reason #4: European water science, inside your bathroom
settings.text:
The same chelation tech that protects city pipes now protects your bowl.

Hard water regions across Europe have relied on mineral chelation for decades.

Proven. Boring. Works.

In Denmark alone, chelation cut household cleaning product use by up to 50%.

This system brings that same technology home.

Every flush chelates calcium and magnesium.

Keeps minerals dissolved.

So they flush away instead of hardening on your porcelain.

You stop chasing stains.

They stop forming.

Decades of European water science. Now it fits inside your toilet.

settings.heading: Reason #5: So simple your kids could install it
settings.text:
Drops into your tank. Plant-derived formula. No corrosion. No damage.

Drops right into the tank.

No tools. No plumber.

Under 60 seconds.

Unlike harsh tank tablets that corrode flapper valves and cause leaks, this plant-derived formula is safe for every internal part.

Every flush sends treated water into the bowl automatically.

Handles 15-20 flushes a day.

Built for families.

Safe for your tank. Safe for your pets. Safe for your plumbing.

settings.heading: Reason #6: 200,000+ households already stopped scrubbing
settings.text:
4.85 stars. 5,247+ reviews. Their words, not mine.

Hard water results. Pet safety. Easy install. "Wish I found this sooner."

200,000+ homes stopped fighting hard water. They started preventing it.
